product_description: Fluid, lightweight fabric in an easy wide-leg silhouette shapes this jumpsuit styled in vintage-looking flowers and ruffles and finished in a lace-up racerback.
product_details_and_care:
Fluid, lightweight fabric in an easy wide-leg silhouette shapes this jumpsuit styled in vintage-looking flowers and ruffles and finished in a lace-up racerback.
22" inseam
Back lace-up closure
Surplice V-neck with hook-and-eye closure
Sleeveless, with cutaway shoulders
Adjustable straps
Elastic waist
100% viscose
Machine wash, dry flat
Imported
Item #6070414
product_size_info:
True to size.
XS=0, S=2-4, M=6-8, L=10-12, XL=14.
